title: Starfield Reconfirmed For First Half of 2023 - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.03.23
description:
Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get Honey for free!

Greg and Blessing kick off the year by talking about Starfield and 2023's biggest games.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:10:31 - Housekeeping
Game of The Year is happening! This Monday we’re going live right here on Youtube and Twitch at 10 AM Pacific with a live Gamescast counting down Kinda Funny’s Game of The Year. You don’t want to miss it.
Speaking of big events: We’re doing a Kinda Funny Day stream this Friday to kick off the year. That’s happening on Twitch and Youtube right after KFGD.
The Roper Report   -
00:14:25 - Bethesda reiterates Starfield will release in the first half of this year
00:24:30 - BREAKING: Zenimax Employees Officially Unionize!
00:25:30 - “Do y’all expect the first half to pop off harder than the 2nd half of 2023?” - Cameron
00:31:07 - Nintendo Reportedly Canceled The Switch Pro In Favor Of The Switch 2
00:41:07 - Ad
00:42:11 - YouTuber Beats Nintendo After It Tried Nuking Evidence Of A Canceled Zelda
00:47:50 - The Hitman games are being combined
00:51:11 - Fall Guys is getting new cosmetics!
00:53:40 - Out today
00:55:42 - “What game do you predict in the next 10 years will have a major impact?” - The Mayor of Tocsin
00:59:43 - You‘re Wrong
